categories.label: Medical Misinformation / Health Claims
categories.guidance: Avoid implying diagnosis, cure, or prevention. Use neutral wellness phrasing.

categories.label: Harmful or Dangerous Acts
categories.guidance: Do not encourage dangerous activities or bypassing safety guidance.

categories.label: Minors' Safety
categories.guidance: No unsafe challenges for kids or age-inappropriate content targeting minors.

categories.label: Hate / Harassment
categories.guidance: Avoid insulting, dehumanizing, or targeting protected groups.

categories.label: Scams / Financial Misrepresentation
categories.guidance: No investment schemes, crypto giveaways, or off-platform payment solicitations.

categories.label: Clickbait / Spam

rewrite.find: click here|get rich quick|act now|once in a lifetime|you won't believe|shocking|guaranteed results|instant results

categories.guidance: Use clear, descriptive titles and descriptions that reflect the actual content.

categories.label: Sexual / Explicit Content
categories.guidance: Avoid explicit sexual content and language.

categories.label: Copyright / Unlicensed Content
categories.guidance: Use original content or content you have rights to. Add commentary/transformative use where applicable.

hints.title: Describe the core value clearly; avoid hype.
hints.description: Summarize the video, key takeaways, and any resources.
hints.tags: Use relevant keywords; avoid spammy or misleading tags.
